page.title: 17HOUSING
page.content: About one third of householders in Strathaven own their own homes. Here are details of houses offered for sale recently. DETACHED CHALET BUNGALOW_7 apartments, breakfasting kitchen,bathroom and seperate W.C.,gas central heating, garage_over Â£52,500. SEMI_DETACHED VILLA_3 bedrooms, lounge,dining room,fitted kitchen, bathroom,integral garage,2 car carport ,gas central heating_Â£32,750 SPACIOUS SEMI VILLA_2 public rooms,3 bedrooms,loft bedroom/study,well fitted kitchen,bathroom with shower, gas central heating,garage_over Â£37,500.***** As can be seen house prices tend to be higher than average or the surrounding towns such as Stonehouse,Larkhall etc.This reflects the fact that a higher number of people are in "proffessional" jobs.
